item.title: The Weavers - On Top of Old Smokey - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by The Weavers.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Weavers - The Crawdad Song - Key of D
item.description:
For Educational Use. Key of D: D, A7, Hawaiian D7, G. Performance by the Weavers, in the original key. Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oqTRpH-7bOM
Ukulele font is from Chordette for Education which is available at ukefarm.com

item.title: The Weavers - The Crawdad Song - Key of C
item.description:
For Educational Use. Key of C: C, G7, C7, F. Performance by the Weavers. The key has been lowered by a whole step. Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oqTRpH-7bOM
Ukulele font is from Chordette for Education which is available at ukefarm.com
